name: Cubic Adventure (AfkDev Games)
description: Decided to share my first prototype ever. Filled with secrets, but no more than a game to test your reflexes and spend a few minutes beating all of the levels. It is just an unfinished idea with basic shapes, so there is not much to see...for now. The whole game seen here is just a small part of a much bigger, different game. If you would like to explore the secrets of this small prototype, give it a try and let me know what you think. But remember: "There is more to it than what meets the eye".
